CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS( Website,"http://www."),RIGHT( Website, LEN(Website)- 11), IF(CONTAINS(Website,"https://www."),RIGHT( Website, LEN(Website)- 12), IF(CONTAINS(Website,"http://"),RIGHT(Website, LEN(Website)- 7), IF(CONTAINS(Website,"https://"),RIGHT(Website, LEN(Website)- 8),Website))))
CustomField.label: Domain
